text: Frie Leysen (19 February 1950 - 22 September 2020) was a Belgian festival director. She was director of the art centre deSingel from 1980 until 1991. In 1994, she co-founded the Kunstenfestivaldesarts in Brussels. Leysen died on 22 September 2020 aged 70. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Belgian artists Category:People from Hasselt
title: Frie Leysen
